summary: Loom now has Durable Object-backed rate limiting, and auto-save actually syncs to the server. Meadow got its community feed with RSS and two-level privacy controls, and I finally wired up the observability dashboard I've been calling Vista. Mostly a lot of renaming and lint fixes under the hood to get everything ready for 1.0.
